<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Bulk update security rules</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v2/security/rules/bulk/update"}></MethodEndpoint>



Update security rules in bulk. Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>filters</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"search"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Search string","example":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"severities"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`INFO`, `LOW`, `MEDIUM`, `HIGH`, `SEVERE`]"} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Filter by the severities of the security rules. You can manually test your results in the [UI](https://app.logz.io/#/dashboard/security/rules/rule-definitions?from=0&sortBy=updatedAt&sortOrder=DESC).","items":{"type":"string","example":"SEVERE","enum":["INFO","LOW","MEDIUM","HIGH","SEVERE"]}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"updatedBy"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Email addresses of the last users to update the rules","items":{"type":"string","example":"user@company.com"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdBy"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Email addresses of the users to create the rules","items":{"type":"string","example":"user@company.com"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabledState"} required={false} schemaName={"list of booleans"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"list of booleans","description":"true to include enabled rules, false to include disabled rules. An empty list defaults to both enabled and disabled rules."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"emailNotifications"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"List of email addresses on the recipients list to receive notifications when the rules trigger.","items":{"type":"string","example":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"notificationsEndpointIds"} required={false} schemaName={"int32[]"} rules.","example":"threat","items":{"type":"object","example":{"network_threat":null,"recon":null}}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ruleIds"} required={false} schemaName={"int32[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0}}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem
